name: Osurac CCG
description:
Battle against the Great Houses of Osurac to unite the land. Select attributes, powers and abilities to defeat your enemies. Collect allies, manage your decks, and increase your reputation with the Great Houses so that you can get access to even more powerful allies. Osurac is a strategic turn based collectable card game with RPG elements.

FEATURES:
- Select your own character and background from one of the Great Houses of Osurac
- Use your experience gained from battles to select which attributes, powers, and abilities to level up
- 10 Factions with unique special abilities
- Buy allies from each of the 10 Factions
- Level up your allies by gaining experience in battle
- Buy and use equipment to further enhance yourself and your allies.

Osurac tests your ability to put together the best deck possible and develop strategies to defeat all of your enemies. Osurac is free to play and it is designed so that you can play all areas of the game and complete it without the use of in-app purchases (although they can speed up your play if you wish to use them).
